title: Namespace Reputation Record
description: Verifiable record of an entity's reputation within a namespace, including trust scores and endorsements.

namespace.description: DID of the namespace issuing the reputation record.

entity.description: DID of the entity whose reputation is being recorded.

trustScore.description: Numerical representation of the entityâ€™s reputation within the namespace.

type.description: Nature of contribution (e.g., governance vote, data contribution, content verification).

verifiedBy.description: DID of entity that verified this contribution.

contributions.description: List of contributions made by the entity.

from.description: DID of the entity giving the endorsement.

endorsements.description: Endorsements received from other trusted entities.

proof.description: Cryptographic proof for this reputation record.

type.description: Proof type (e.g., JSON-LD Signature, EdDSA Signature, zk-SNARK Proof).

verificationMethod.description: DID or method used to verify this proof.
